group_1.narration: < A rumor is currently spreading@among the Magical Girls of Kamihama City... >

group_1.textRight: Get a load of this, Shizuku!

group_1.textLeft: What is it?

group_1.textRight: Oh my, have you heard? Has anyone told you?
The rumor of some new info about@Nemu Hiiragi's book!

group_1.textLeft: I haven't heard anything about that...but...
Was the half-baked impersonation necessary...?

group_1.textRight: Yowch, "half-baked"?![chara:301901:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301901:cheek_0][chara:301901:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:301901:lipSynch_1] Copying the Uwasa's@speaking style is hard, you know!

group_1.textLeft: Anyway, what's up with Nemu Hiiragi's book?

group_1.textCenter: Guess what!@According to a rumor I heard...
The [textBlue:Rumors] are still kicking around inside@the book they were written in!

group_1.textRight: Huh? Is that true?!
I thought the [textBlue:Rumors] all got erased@when the Magius disappeared...!

group_1.textLeft: That means people could still be in danger...!
No, I don't think that's possible.
I doubt they have enough magic to affect@anything outside of their book.

group_1.textRight: ...Well, that's a relief and all, but...
If that's the case, how's this rumor@spreading around?

group_1.textLeft: The [textBlue:Rumors] shouldn't be taking victims anymore,@so...

group_1.textRight: It's weird that there's a rumor going around,@isn't it?
Maybe someone went inside the book!

group_1.textLeft: That sounds really dangerous. Do you think@someone would do that on purpose?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it's possible!
Then, does something amazing happen@if you get inside the book...?

group_1.textLeft: So I heard, at least.
That's why everyone's itching to go to the@Memory Museum!
The space for the [textBlue:Rumors] still exists@inside the book...
Which is why the rumor of the Memory Museum@is going around, correct?

group_1.textRight: Yes.
They say that if you visit the Memory Museum,
you can get back to your roots as a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: That's the [textBlue:Rumor] that's going around about@the Memory Museum...?
I've heard it in passing, but I didn't know it was@so widespread.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, everyone's in on it!

group_1.textLeft: Your first days as a Magical Girl, huh...
It's been ages since then, so that memory might@be kinda hazy for me.

group_1.textRight: I can't think of much about mine, either.@I wonder if I forgot...?

group_1.textLeft: Maybe it's been such a long time that we've all@forgotten about it.

group_1.textRight: Still, it's only a rumor.@We don't know if it's true or not.
It's true, Yachiyo.

group_1.textLeft: Eh?

group_1.textRight: Right, Sakurako?
| It is indeed true. |
| Both the part about the Memory Museum, |
| as well as the part... |
| ...about the [textBlue:Rumor] still existing inside@of Nemu's book. |

group_1.textLeft: Then, is it also true that you can go inside@the book?

group_1.textCenter: Quick to hear about things, ain't ya?
If you an' Nemu Hiiragi sync up your Soul Gems,
you'll be able to enter the Memory Museum@inside a' her book.
We can do that for ya, since we're Coordinators.
But are you sure you wanna go through with it?
I'm not gonna tell ya you can't, but there's@a certain risk involved, ya know?
Things you mighta forgotten about ain't necessarily@gonna be happy memories...
But if this is what ya want, we'll lend a hand.
An' find that there was somethin' precious ya lost@in the shuffle.
We'll count this as a reward for sharin' your@thoughts. Keep your chin up an' head on in!
